titleInfo.title: Statue of Sekhmet, Temple of Mut

mods.abstract: Lion-headed goddess wearing broken crown with double uraei upon brow, arms broken, seated upon straight back, block like throne, cartouche inscribed, right front of throne (foreground); ruins and vegetation (background); untitled print, "574" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
